author: roosterred
title: Jayko's back, and this time he's king!
review: 5/5! 10/10! This is a very cool knights kindom set! The catapult is very sturdy, and the boulder can shoot up to 10 feet! As you push the catapult, the two axes move back and for a slicing affect. Now for the best part... KING JAYKO! They really made a cool change to him making him look better than ever! His armor includes very large, but not too large leg protectors and shoulder pads, both chrome. His torso has a picture of a white hawk. and both of his arms move for a "fighting" affect! His face changed, making him look older, and having a beard, and the crown is very cool, and gold colored. King Jayko's shield has the image of, once again, a GOLD hawk, and is also pretty hard to break off in "battle!". and now the coolest part... his sword! his sword is a swift white, and very cool design on it. All in all, an AWESOME set! buy it! you wont regret it!

author: Gus_263
title: King of Morcia
review: The latest Jayko toy, like very the others, with a beard in the face with gold and white colors, new sword and armor,a option for custom knights. The crown are the same, can be used in all knights. This king with the hawk symbol don't like a king of the real life, but the new catapult is a adittion for creation, and the axes can be used with various themes, including bionicle.

author: hustla187
title: Bit Odd
review: If you liked the Knight's Kingdom sets, this may be a good one to pick up. However, the catpult should be a little more bigger for accuracy. King Jayko does look a little weird as a king, but this might be good to pick up.

author: tkettle9719
title: Mata Nui Bless the King!
review:
I got this set at regular price, and I really like it. It isn't as cool if you don't have Vladek, but it is a change for the better for this posthumous series.

Pros

  • -The catapult works great, and the ball explodes!
  • -The shield is the smae as last year's but has different colors. Perfect:)
  • …

Cons

  • -The silver armor and sword don't work for me.
  • -The fact that Jayko has aged so much is a bit strange...
  • …

This set is really great, and is a great addition to the Knight's Kingdom collection. Get it at a price below 50 dollars, even though it's gone.
